channel.title: Please help with running clients
channel.description:
About 30% of the clients i try to run i get this error code:
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:276) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319) Press any key to continue . . .
I have jdk6u10 6u2 6u3 ect and jre. java.com deosnt work. my system path is C:\WINDOWS\system32
My CLASSPATH is C:\WINDOWS\system32\cmd.exe And i did try making my path C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;C:\ It wont work!
Someone please help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 27, 2008, 02:49:04 pm[/size][hr]please someone

item.title: Please help with running clients
item.dc:creator: @blitz_u_down blitz u down
item.description:
@blitz_u_down wrote:

About 30% of the clients i try to run i get this error code:

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: EGUI
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: EGUI
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:200)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:188)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:306)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:276)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:251)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(ClassLoader.java:319)
Press any key to continue . . .

I have jdk6u10 6u2 6u3 ect and jre. java.com deosnt work. my system path is C:\WINDOWS\system32

My CLASSPATH is C:\WINDOWS\system32\cmd.exe And i did try making my path C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;C:\ It wont work!

Someone please help.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 27, 2008, 02:49:04 pm[/size][hr]please someone
